tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE utility_usage_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meter_id INT,
  utility_type VARCHAR(50),
  usage_quantity DECIMAL(10,2),
  usage_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE meter_reading (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reading_id INT,
    reading_date DATE,
    electricity_usage FLOAT,
    water_usage FLOAT,
    gas_usage FLOAT
);
